OOC: You didn't think I was going to leave him out for ever did you?  But I'm 
only bringing him back... I just didn't like the others as much.

::Aerotaur::
       A lone stasis pod was shot from the depths of space under mysterious 
and yet irrelevant circumstances.  The pod rocketed off in a random and yet 
coincidental direction that took it through a rip in the fabric of space time 
and deposited him in the general direction of Earth.  Specifically a few 
miles from the Maximal/Predicon/Tripred battle.

       The stasis pod landed on top of a rather unusual scene. It came down 
on top of an early human that had just killed a horse and a large bird. 
Having crushed them and since it had been damaged on the way down the stasis 
pod could not determine the true bone structure it was scanning. The net 
result was a noble creature with the lower body of a horse, the upper body of 
a humanoid, and two large, angelic wings sprouting out of the humanoid's 
back. He looks around and heads toward the commotion nearby.

--part1_4d.20852841.2a553aba_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
